data.title: Niantic Research
data.meta_description: An international and multidisciplinary research team focused on machine learning, artificial intelligence, computer vision and computer graphics. Our goal is to enable new ways for others to explore, understand and interact with each other in a shared augmented world.
data.text:
We are an international and multidisciplinary research team focused on machine learning, artificial intelligence, computer vision and computer graphics. Our goal is to enable new ways for others to explore, understand and interact with each other in a shared augmented world.

We collaborate extensively with academics and top students from universities around the world. Our research is presented at international conferences, and we share our code and insights with the wider scientific community.
